name: ASCredentialProviderViewController
desc: A view controller that a password manager app uses to extend Password AutoFill.

items.name: var extensionContext: ASCredentialProviderExtensionContext
items.desc: The context your credential provider extension uses to provide information to the system.

items.name: class ASCredentialProviderExtensionContext
items.desc: A mechanism that credential provider extensions use to communicate with the system.

items.name: func prepareInterfaceForExtensionConfiguration()
items.desc: Prepares the interface to enable the user to configure the extension.

items.name: class ASCredentialIdentityStore
items.desc: A container that your extension fills to provide credentials through the QuickType bar.

items.name: func prepareCredentialList(for: [ASCredentialServiceIdentifier])
items.desc: Prepares the interface to display a list of credentials from which the user can select.

items.name: class ASCredentialServiceIdentifier
items.desc: An identifier representing a particular service for which the user needs a credential, like a web site.

items.name: func provideCredentialWithoutUserInteraction(for: ASPasswordCredentialIdentity)
items.desc: Attempts to provide the user-requested credential with no further user interaction.

items.name: func prepareInterfaceToProvideCredential(for: ASPasswordCredentialIdentity)
items.desc: Prepares the interface for a user interaction, like a database login, that enables it to access and return the credential for the given identity.

items.name: class ASPasswordCredentialIdentity
items.desc: A description that uniquely identifies a particular credential.
